A highly prestigious hacker has gone rogue, threatening to use new-found tools to obliterate anyone in his path. It's up to you to find and stop him.
Rejoin the thrilling world of hacking you left long ago, and reunite with an old friend.
Form an elite team of hackers and face a threat greater than you have ever faced before.
